languages.text: {n}В назначенный час в жилых секторах, пораженных скверной, синхронно случились взрывы и обрушения. Под обломками гибли и невинные, но у еретиков не было шанса избежать отмщения.{/n}

{n}At the appointed time, the infected residential sectors were synchronously shaken by explosions and collapsing structures. Though innocents also perished under the debris, the heretics could not escape retribution.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В назначенный час в жилых секторах, пораженных скверной, синхронно случились взрывы и обрушения. Под обломками гибли и невинные, но у еретиков не было шанса избежать отмщения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At the appointed time, the residential sectors, infected by plague, had been synchronically shook by explosions and collapses. The innocents had also perished under the debris, but the heretics could not escape the retribution.{/n}

{n}At the appointed time, the residential sectors, infected by plague, had been synchronically shook by explosions and collapses. The innocents had also perished under the debris, but the heretics could not escape the retribution.{/n}

{n}At the appointed time, the residential sectors, infected by plague, were synchronously shaken by explosions and forced collapses. Innocents also perished under the debris, but the heretics could not escape retribution.{/n}

{n}At the appointed time, the infected residential sectors were synchronously shaken by explosions and collapsing structures. Though innocents also perished under the debris, the heretics could not escape retribution.{/n}

languages.text: {n}预定的时间到了，受瘟疫感染的居民区在爆炸与塌陷之中化为废墟。尽管无辜之人葬身碎石瓦砾之下，但异端分子也没能逃脱惩罚。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the infected residential sectors were synchronously shaken by explosions and collapsing structures. Though innocents also perished under the debris, the heretics could not escape retribution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}预定的时间到了，受瘟疫感染的居民区在爆炸与塌陷之中化为废墟。尽管无辜之人葬身碎石瓦砾之下，但异端分子也没能逃脱惩罚。{/n}
{n}预定的时间到了，受瘟疫感染的居民区在爆炸与塌陷之中化为废墟。无辜之人葬身碎石之下，但异端分子也没能逃脱惩罚。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A la hora acordada, los sectores residenciales infectados sufrieron simultáneamente el impacto de las explosiones y los derrumbes de grandes estructuras. Aunque también murieron inocentes bajo los escombros, los herejes no pudieron escapar a su castigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the infected residential sectors were synchronously shaken by explosions and collapsing structures. Though innocents also perished under the debris, the heretics could not escape retribution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A la hora acordada, los sectores residenciales infectados sufrieron simultáneamente el impacto de las explosiones y los derrumbes de grandes estructuras. Aunque también murieron inocentes bajo los escombros, los herejes no pudieron escapar a su castigo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}定刻になると、感染した居住セクターは爆発と強制崩壊に同調して揺れた。罪のない住人たちも巻き添えとなって瓦礫の下で犠牲となったが、異端者たちは罪への罰を免れることはできなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the infected residential sectors were synchronously shaken by explosions and collapsing structures. Though innocents also perished under the debris, the heretics could not escape retribution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}定刻になると、疫病に感染した居住セクターは爆発と強制崩壊に同調して揺れた。罪のない住人たちも巻き添えとなって瓦礫の下で犠牲となったが、異端者たちは罪への罰を免れることはできなかった。{/n}
{n}定刻になると、疫病に感染した居住セクターは爆発と強制崩壊に同調して揺れた。罪のない住人たちも巻き添えとなって瓦礫の下で犠牲となったが、異端者たちは罪への罰を免れることはできなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À l'heure prévue, les secteurs résidentiels infectés sont simultanément secoués par des séries d'explosions et d'effondrements. Si des innocents périssent sous les décombres, aucun hérétique n'échappe à ces représailles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the infected residential sectors were synchronously shaken by explosions and collapsing structures. Though innocents also perished under the debris, the heretics could not escape retribution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'heure prévue, les secteurs résidentiels infectés sont simultanément secoués par des séries d'explosions et d'effondrements. Si des innocents périssent sous les décombres, aucun hérétique n'échappe à ces représailles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zu der vereinbarten Zeit wurden die infizierten Wohnsektoren gleichzeitig von Explosionen und einstürzenden Strukturen erschüttert. Obwohl auch Unschuldige unter den Trümmern begraben wurden, konnten die Ketzer der Vergeltung nicht entkommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the infected residential sectors were synchronously shaken by explosions and collapsing structures. Though innocents also perished under the debris, the heretics could not escape retribution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zu der vereinbarten Zeit wurden die infizierten Wohnsektoren gleichzeitig von Explosionen und einstürzenden Strukturen erschüttert. Obwohl auch Unschuldige unter den Trümmern begraben wurden, konnten die Ketzer der Vergeltung nicht entkommen.{/n}

{n}Zu der vereinbarten Zeit wurden die von der Seuche infizierten Wohnsektoren alle gleichzeitig von Explosionen und absichtlich herbeigeführten Zusammenbrüchen erschüttert. Auch Unschuldige wurden unter den Trümmern begraben, doch die Ketzer konnten ihrer Vergeltung nicht entkommen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vebadan etkilenen yerleşim sektörleri, belirlenen saatte eş zamanlı olarak patlamalar ve yıkılan yapılarla sarsıldı. Enkazın altında masumlar da can verdi ancak kâfirler, cezalarından kaçamadı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the appointed time, the infected residential sectors were synchronously shaken by explosions and collapsing structures. Though innocents also perished under the debris, the heretics could not escape retribution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vebadan etkilenen yerleşim sektörleri, belirlenen saatte eş zamanlı olarak patlamalar ve yıkılan yapılarla sarsıldı. Enkazın altında masumlar da can verdi ancak kâfirler, cezalarından kaçamadı.{/n}
